Tesla refines their finance markerting

They were right, so we are fixing it and, moreover, upping the ante by providing the best resale value guarantee in the automotive industry.

Elon Musk

Rather than digging their heels in, they’ve adjusted the prospective monthly payment value to include the buy back guarantee but exclude all the more contentious items included in the previous offering (avoiding the gas station, shortening your commute and the business tax, which are still available but opt-in).
